name: Fruitalistic!
description:
Fruitland is in peril! Use your launchers and trusty fruit squad to repel the sugary invaders, and bring peace once again.

Features:
  • Intuitive one-touch controls: Click, drag and release to launch, click and drag to scroll the camera.
  • 50+ Levels: A large base set of levels and areas, with different zones presenting unique challenges.
  • Skill based unlockables: A variety of additional hats to adorn your fruit, and launchers to fire them from can be unlocked.
